Cart Items

{{cart.productName}}
{{cart.quantity + 1}}
{{ cart.productPrice}}
Sub-Total
2 items
${{subTotal}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductService } from 'src/app/services/product.service'; import { SharedService } from 'src/app/services/shared.service'; import { Product } from '../../product-list/product.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sale', templateUrl: './sale.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sale.component.css'] }) export class SaleComponent implements OnInit { products!: string; cartProducts: any[] = []; subTotal: number = 0; saleObj: any = { "SaleId": 0, "CustId": 1, "SaleDate": new Date(), "TotalInvoiceAmount": 0, "Discount": 0, "PaymentNaration": "Patmm ", "DeliveryAddress1": "Plot nio 122", "DeliveryAddress2": "Ner ATM", "DeliveryCity": "Pune", "DeliveryPinCode": "440033", "DeliveryLandMark": "ATM" }; constructor(private productService: ProductService, private sharedService:SharedService) { debugger; } ngOnInit(){ this.loadCart(); this.sharedService.currentValue.subscribe(value => this.products = value ); } loadCart() { this.subTotal = 0; this.productService.getCartItemsByCustId(1).subscribe((res: any) => { this.cartProducts = res.data; this.cartProducts.forEach(element => { this.subTotal = this.subTotal + element.productPrice; }); debugger; }) } RemoveItem(id: number) { this.productService.removeCartItemById(id).subscribe((res: any) => { if (res.result) { this.loadCart(); this.productService.cartAddedSubject.next(true); } }) } makeSale() { this.saleObj.TotalInvoiceAmount = this.subTotal; this.productService.cartAddedSubject.next(true); this.productService.makeSale( this.saleObj).subscribe((res: any) => { if (res.result) { alert("Sale Success") this.loadCart(); this.productService.cartAddedSubject.next(true); } }) } }
